programmes.show_description: The Window to the Heart - Floral Wishes Concept Card Kit brings you a beautiful mix of images and poetry suitable for making heartfelt cards all year round for special moments.
Join Ali Reeve for a relaxed hour of crafting inspiration, featuring new products, expert demos, and great offers to top up your stash.

programmes.show_name: Pick a Pocket or Four Bag
programmes.show_description: Pick a Pocket or Four is a new bag pattern from Jennie Rayment, where she will be demonstrating how to use FQ's to create these beautiful bags.
Discover the creative possibilities of Brother Embroidery Machines - designed to bring beautiful stitched designs, lettering, and personalised details to life with ease.
Anne-Marie introduces Floral Wreaths - beautifully detailed designs made for crafters who love creating elegant, layered projects.
Mark is back with his latest collection, Grunge Florals! Packed with cardmaking, mixed media, art journalling and scrapbooking inspiration in his signature grunge style.
Tune in for the new Duo Design Paper Pads with Anne-Marie. These 8" x 8" pads are perfect for a variety of projects, offering double-sided designs that vary in pattern and colour.
